transcripts.text: Restored Republic via GCR update as of April 24, 2020.  Judy note, no one knew the exact date of the RV, though the latest intel indicated that we remained on an hour-to-hour basis.  Things were moving behind the scene, especially about 45 minutes after the House passed the $484 billion stimulus bill today Thursday 23 April according to the Fleming Update at 7.05 pm EDT.  According to the Iraqi stock market website, this Sunday 26 April the Iraqi stock market would reopen with the new dinar rate after having been closed since Friday 17 March.  Bruce, Tier 4 was set to be funded at 2.30am Friday 24 April when the intermediates would begin to be paid out.  The gold standard could be announced on Sunday 26 April.  The intermediates would be completed by Monday morning 27 April.  The 800 numbers should go out around lunchtime.  EDT that Monday the 27th of April and Tier 4 could start with appointments, or wait until Tuesday the 28th of April.  Appointments for the contract rates would go until Friday the 15th of May.  The new money could come out that Friday and the fiat dollar won't be good after 90 days, or by the 15th of August.  The central banks were sending out loads of uncirculated US bills stamped from 2009 to 2013.  It was believed that they were getting rid of stockpiles of money at the banks, leftovers from the Fed.  Q could have given us a hint about that upcoming RV date when he said, C before D. This was believed to mean that saving the children would come before disclosure.  Yesterday Wednesday the 22nd of April the Navy hospital ship Comfort returned to its home base in Virginia.  It had been docked in the New York Harbor where it was said to be used for emergency care for the thousands of badly traumatized and abused children and corpses found in a deep underground tunnel beneath New York, a tunnel that ran beneath Central Park, connected to the Clinton Foundation building and then went on to New York Harbor where the Comfort was docked.  Disclosure, on Wednesday the 22nd of April Wikileaks released all their files on the internet.
